reasoning: Given the negative expected value and poor risk/reward ratio, it is prudent to avoid any positions in NVDA. The current market conditions and valuation concerns further support this stance.
vs_research_manager: While the research manager recommends a sell, my analysis aligns with avoiding any positions due to the unfavorable metrics, rather than exiting existing ones.
